doc.field: GENERALE DUTCH UNIT LAUNCHES CD PROGRAMME

- The Amsterdam unit of French bank Societe Generale said it is launching a 50-mln guilder, five month certificate of deposit programme starting March 6 and ending September 7. Denominations will be in one mln guilders. The price is to be set on March 4, issue date is March 6 and redemption at par is on September 7. Subscriptions are to be placed with Societe Generale, Oolders en de Jong C.V or Haighton en Ruth B.V. A global note for the issue will be deposited with the Dutch central bank.
